price: When they saw the believers, they would say, “These people are truly misguided,”
arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡهُمۡ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
